page.title: 11LIFE STYLES(1)CALCOT,READING
page.content: Life styles in Calcot differ greatly in degree.Some families being able to enjoy a high standard of living,whilst others are only just able to exist. Much of the modern world centres young people,especially with fashion. A decade or two ago,fashions were aimed at young people in the 20 or 30 year age group.Today fashions are aimed at the teenage market. Consumer goods are also aimed at the young market.Teeagers in the Calcot area can be seen walking down the street carrying their casette-radios, the sound audible for all to hear!Almost all young people are into pop(ular) music. Young girls today will be seen wearing the make-up of their favourite pop star.Make-up is often quite heavily used,especially by 'punks'.
